T02D1200:117b-5: nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyir zhi ba /

T02D1200:117b-7: du byung ba'i dga' ba khong du chud pa'i phyir
T02D1200:117b-8: mchog gzhan ma / rang bzhin dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir bsam du med pa /
T02D1200:117b-9: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su med pa'i phyir skye ba med pa /
T02D1200:117b-10: srog gi 'khor lo la srog gi grags pa can zhes 'di ltar gsungs te /
T02D1200:117b-11: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid rlung gi 'khor lo skyed byed ma bdag / gang phyir zhe na /
T02D1200:117b-12: rang bzhin gyis rlung gi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir dgongs pa'o //
T02D1200:117b-13: me yi 'khor lo'i nang du thim /
T02D1200:117b-14: yi ge med pa'i 'khor lo gcig / drang ba'i don gyi bcom ldan 'das kyi lung ngo //
T02D1200:117b-15: rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzhung gis bcom ldan 'das
T02D1200:117b-16: rdo rje rigs skye bo rdo rjer grags pa bde
T02D1200:117b-18: slob dpon ku ku ri pa'i zhal snga nas kyi
T02D1200:117b-19: gzhung gis me long lta bu'i ye shes ngo bo
T02D1200:117b-20: mi g-yo ba'i phyir yi ge med pa /
T02D1200:117b-21: stong chen po'i rang bzhin gyi phyir rnam pa thams cad /
T02D1200:117b-22: rnam pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa tsam gyi phyir kun la gnas pa /
T02D1200:117b-23: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo'i phyir kun la khyab pa dang /
T02D1200:117b-24: yang na nam mkha' rang bzhin gyi phyir /
T02D1200:117b-25: shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo'i phyir bde ba 'byung ba /
T02D1200:117b-26: mchog gi dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi phyir bde ba 'phel ba /
T02D1200:117b-27: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir
T02D1200:117b-28: dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi yi ge dang bral ba
T02D1200:117b-29: / bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1200:117b-30: khams gsum ma lus pa rgyu bar byed pa po //
T02D1200:117b-31: tshul ni glo bur ba'i gnas zhes bya ba la /
T02D1200:117b-32: drang ba'i don gyi bcom ldan 'das kyi lung ngo //
T02D1200:117b-33: nges pa'i don gyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzhung
T02D1200:117b-34: gis dpal rdo rje grags pa chen po'i rgyal po
T02D1200:117b-36: shes rab dang thabs dang 'khyud pa'i dus su tshul gyis 'du shes can /
T02D1200:117b-37: rmad du byung ba'i dga' ba spro ba /
T02D1200:117b-38: gang gi dga' bas thos pa dang /
T02D1200:118a-0: @118a * // dran pa dang nyams su myong ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa yang /
T02D1200:118a-1: bde ba chen po'i bde ba rnyed pas /
T02D1200:118a-2: phyi'i bud med kyi bde ba bsnyen pas dga' ba de ltar ni ma yin no //
T02D1200:118a-3: de'i phyir phyi ma yin pas rnam pa thams cad
T02D1200:118a-4: dang bral ba bde mchog dbang phyug gis zhes gsungs
T02D1200:118a-5: so ; / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la
T02D1200:118a-6: sogs pa la gzung bar dka' ba'i phyir shin tu
T02D1200:118a-7: 'jigs par byed pa'i klu'i lce'i rnam pa /
T02D1200:118a-8: ji ltar dpa' bo yin kyang sprul chen po'i lce mthong na 'jigs so //
T02D1200:118a-9: de ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa la dga' ba 'byung
T02D1200:118a-10: ba sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi theg /'on kyang gzhan
T02D1200:118a-11: ma lha dang mi ci smos /
T02D1200:118a-12: nam mkha' la sogs pa la byed pa po zhes
T02D1200:118a-13: bya ba la phyi'i don gyis 'di ltar bshad de
T02D1200:118a-14: / nam kha'i sgra ni mtho ris /
T02D1200:118a-15: sogs pa'i sgra ni mi yul dang sa 'og /
T02D1200:118a-16: nang gi don gyis mchog gi dga' ba la sogs
T02D1200:118a-17: pa / slob dpon do mbi pa'i zhal snga nas
T02D1200:118a-18: kyi gzhung gis rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs
T02D1200:118a-19: pa / pa'i skad cig / dpal aindra bh'u te'i zhal snga'i gzhung gis /
T02D1200:118a-20: ye shes gzugs dang bral ba'i phyir yi ge med pa /
T02D1200:118a-21: reg bya dang bral ba'i phyir khams med pa la /
T02D1200:118a-22: ro dang bral ba'i phyir gug skyed med pa /
T02D1200:118a-23: sgra dang thal ba'i phyir thig le med pa dri ma med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa /
T02D1200:118a-24: rang byung ba'i phyir skye ba med pa /
T02D1200:118a-25: nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyir mi zad pa /
T02D1200:118a-26: don dam pa'i lta ba zhes dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung ngo //
T02D1200:118a-27: lte ba'i gnas su la sogs bya ba la /
T02D1200:118a-29: slob dpon nag po pa'i gzhung gis lte ba ni gzhan ma yin /
T02D1200:118a-31: slob dpon dpa' bo bzang po'i gzhung gis /
T02D1200:118a-32: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs su sprul pa'i 'khor lo lnga /
T02D1200:118a-33: dpal sdom pa'i rgya mtsho dang /
T02D1200:118a-34: rigs chen po de kho na nyid kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyud la sogs pa de dang 'dra /
T02D1200:118a-35: mdor na bsdus pa 'dod pa la don gyi phyir /
T02D1200:118a-36: brtag pa gnyis kyi rgyal po'i rgyud la sogs pa rgyas pa ma yin bka' stsal pa /
T02D1200:118a-37: yang na chos la spyod pa shes rab chung ba'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1200:118a-38: tshul tsam chos kyi 'khor lor ni //
T02D1200:118a-39: sbrul gyi mig bzhin dri ma med //
T02D1200:118a-41: drang ba'i don gyi bcom ldan 'das kyi lung ngo //
T02D1200:118b-0: @118b nges pa'i don gyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzhung gis 'di lta ste /
T02D1200:118b-1: bcom ldan 'das la dang po'i dga' ba 'byung ba'i tshe rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas pa /
T02D1200:118b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa la de'i dga' ba'i 'od zer sna tshogs kyis /
T02D1200:118b-3: yang dag par rmad du byung ba ro chen po brgyad skyes so //
T02D1200:118b-4: de gzigs nas phyis nas mchog gi dbang phyug gis /
T02D1200:118b-5: gsang ba chen po'i mchog / tshul tsam mchog gi dga' ba /
T02D1200:118b-6: ye shes chen po rnam par spros pa /
T02D1200:118b-7: chos kyi 'khor lor ni tsandan gang gis so rims kyi gnas kyis bstan pa'o //
T02D1200:118b-8: sprul gyi mig bzhin dri ma med //
T02D1200:118b-11: 'on kyang des ni shin tu dri ma med pa nyid rab tu bstan to //
T02D1200:118b-12: yang na nges pa'i don gyis sprul gyi sgra ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
T02D1200:118b-13: kye la ri'i zhal snga nas kyi gzhung gis snang ba mched pa /
T02D1200:118b-14: slob dpon badzra nam gyi zhal snga nas kyi gzhung gis rdo rje nyi ma shar ba /
T02D1200:118b-15: ka ma la bi r'i zhal snga nas kyi gzhung gis thig le ye shes 'bigs pa /
T02D1200:118b-16: rgyal mo lag smi'i gzhung gis sa la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga dang bral ba /
T02D1200:118b-17: de'i phyir nyid rdo rje 'dzin pas yang dag dri ma med pa gsungs so //
T02D1200:118b-18: cha med pa'i phyir spros pa med pa gzhan ma'i gzhung ngo //
T02D1200:118b-19: dri ma med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de'i khyad
T02D1200:118b-20: par can gyi tshig / dri ma med pa bcos
T02D1200:118b-21: ma med pa rnam pa dang bral ba /
T02D1200:118b-22: rnam pa med pa'i phyir gnas med pa /
T02D1200:118b-23: gnas med pa'i phyir mi g-yo ba ye shes kyi nam mkha'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1200:118b-24: ye shes nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyir dpe dang bral ba /
T02D1200:118b-25: dbus dang dbus ma yin pa med pa zhes bya
T02D1200:118b-26: ba ni yod pa dang med pa las 'das pa
T02D1200:118b-27: / chul [*tshul?] tsam mchog gi ye shes ni /
T02D1200:118b-28: lha'i dbang phyug gis mi shes khyab 'jug dang /
T02D1200:118b-32: nye ba'i dbang po la sogs pas kyang mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1200:118b-33: mchog gi longs spyod 'khor lor gnas //
T02D1200:118b-34: mchog gi rnam pa'i bdud rtsi mchog / ces bya ba la /
T02D1200:118b-35: drang ba'i don gyi bcom ldan 'das kyi lung ngo //
T02D1200:118b-36: rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzhung gis nges pa'i don gyi don 'di lta ste /
T02D1200:119a-0: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la mchog @119a * //
T02D1200:119a-1: gi dga' ba ye shes chen po 'byung ba'i tshe /
T02D1200:119a-2: grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1200:119a-3: 'chi ba med pa la sku 'bar ba dag dang /
T02D1200:119a-4: skam par 'gyur ba sems kyis la brgyal ba de
T02D1200:119a-5: ltar mi thub gzigs nas rdo rje 'dzin pa chen
T02D1200:119a-6: pos rab gtum dga' ba la snang ba med par
T02D1200:119a-7: mdzad nas / zhi ba chen po'i mtshan nyid mchog
T02D1200:119a-8: gi grags pa can gyis mtha'i dga' ba zhes rnam
T02D1200:119a-9: mdzad nas / par spros so // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i don ni sngar bshad pas /
T02D1200:119a-10: mchog gi dga' ba zhes bya ba la dga' ba
T02D1200:119a-11: thams cad dang skad cig dang ro rgyas pa'i phyir
T02D1200:119a-12: ro // mchog gi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba la thams cad skye ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1200:119a-13: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i zhal snga'i gzhung gis mig mi thub pa'i skabs su /
T02D1200:119a-14: dpe med pa'i bde ba myong ba'i phyir mchog gi bdud rtsi /
T02D1200:119a-15: slob dpon ku ku ri'i zhal snga'i gzhung gis mi bskyod pa'i phyir mchog gi bdud rtsi /
T02D1200:119a-16: mchog gi dang po ni slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas 'di skad ces bshad de /
T02D1200:119a-17: mchog la yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i dga' ba la /
T02D1200:119a-18: gang zhig 'od zer gyi tshogs de ni mchog gi dang po'o //
T02D1200:119a-19: mchog gi mtha' zhes bya ba la cho ga 'di skad gsungs te /
T02D1200:119a-20: yang dag drag po'i mchog ni dga' ba /
T02D1200:119a-21: gang zhig nye bar zhi ba de nyid do //
T02D1200:119a-23: de ru bzhugs zhes bya ba la //
T02D1200:119a-24: de ru shar ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1200:119a-25: mchog grags mtha' ni dga' bde ma thag tu bri bar bya'o //
T02D1200:119a-26: slob dpon gzhan gyi gzhung gis mchog ni dang po'i dga' ba /
T02D1200:119a-27: mchog gi mtha' ni chad pa'i dga' ba /
T02D1200:119a-28: de ru bzhugs pa ni rang bzhin gyi dga' ba /
T02D1200:119a-29: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i zhal snga nas kyi gzhung gis /
T02D1200:119a-30: mchog gi dang po ni gtso bo nyid /
T02D1200:119a-31: mtha' ni de'i mjug / bzhugs pa zhes bya ba ni bskyod pa med pas so //
T02D1200:119a-32: slob dpon ku ku ri'i zhal snga nas gyi [*kyi] gzhung gis de dang 'dra'o //
T02D1200:119a-33: ji ltar chang gi ro ni bcud ces bya ba la /
T02D1200:119a-34: rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsungs te /
T02D1200:119a-35: phyi rol gyi dpes ni ji ltar shin tu smin
T02D1200:119a-36: pa'i rgyun 'brum gyi ro la dga' ba yod pa
T02D1200:119a-37: de'i phyir / kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis
T02D1200:119b-0: @119b su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ros
T02D1200:119b-1: sngar med pa rmad du byung ba'i zhi ba'i dga'
T02D1200:119b-2: de'i phyir / ba yod do // mchog gi mtha' yis dga' ba la //
T02D1200:119b-3: gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa 'gog / de'i phyir /
T02D1200:119b-4: gzugs dang bral ba'i bdag nyid bzhugs //
T02D1200:119b-5: thams cad bdag nyid dngos po med //
T02D1200:119b-6: ces pa nyid mchog gi dbang phyug gis gsungs so //
T02D1200:119b-7: mchog gzhan bde chen 'khor lor ni //
T02D1200:119b-8: thams cad mtha' yi mtha' na bzhugs //
T02D1200:119b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa sgra ji bzhin gyis so //
T02D1200:119b-10: dngos grub thob pa'i slob dpon gyi gzhung gis //
T02D1200:119b-12: dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po mtha'i dga' ba /
T02D1200:119b-13: zhi ba chen po'i rang bzhin bzhugs pa'i skabs su /
T02D1200:119b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad stong pa nyid 'jigs pa'i phyir brgyal ba /
T02D1200:119b-15: sa la 'gyel ba de ltar gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das phyis nas kyang /
T02D1200:119b-16: mchog sbyin gyi sgras pa can rmad du byung ba chen po'i dga' bar mdzad cing snang ba'o //
T02D1200:119b-17: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba /
T02D1200:119b-18: slob dpon ku ku ri'i zhal snga nas kyi gzhung gis /
T02D1200:119b-19: bde ba chen po tshor ba'i gnas gsang ba'i rin chen gyi snying po'o //
T02D1200:119b-20: kun gyi mtha' yi mtha' na bzhugs //
T02D1200:119b-21: zhes bya ba la 'di skad gsungs te /
T02D1200:119b-22: kun gyi mtha'i sgra ni mtha'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1200:119b-23: de'i mtha' ni ma yin pa rnam par 'byed pa
T02D1200:119b-24: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i sras kyi gzhung gis kun gyi
T02D1200:119b-26: mtha' na bzhugs pa zhes bya ba la rang bzhin gyi dga' ba /
T02D1200:119b-28: blta bar dga' ba'i mtshan nyid dga' //
T02D1200:119b-29: thams cad mtshan nyid min dang bral //
T02D1200:119b-30: brjod med mi zad zhi ba ste //
T02D1200:119b-31: rang dga' nyams su myong ba'i dngos nyid rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs so //
T02D1200:119b-32: bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis //
T02D1200:119b-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sgra ji bzhin gyis bshad do //
T02D1200:119b-34: steng 'og mnyam par skyor ba yi //
T02D1200:119b-35: kha sbyar gyi ni dbyings kyi gnas //
T02D1200:119b-36: zhes 'khor lo rnams la de ltar mtshan nyid bshad do //
T02D1200:119b-37: slob dpon do mbi pa'i zhal snga nas kyi gzhung
T02D1200:119b-38: gis gsang ba'i padma snying por 'og na rlung gi
T02D1200:120a-3: steng na 'ong ba bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo //
T02D1200:120a-4: slob dpon bi las badzra'i gzhung gis /
T02D1200:120a-5: 'dab ma ni gang rung gsal ba /
T02D1200:120a-7: slob dpon gzhan ma'i gzhung gis nang gi 'dab ma ni 'dus pa /
T02D1200:120a-8: de'i phyir kha sbyor gyi rnam pa yod pas zhes bstan to //
T02D1200:120a-9: bcu gnyis kyi phyed la sogs pa la 'khor lo rnams kyi 'dab ma'i grangs kyi tshad /
T02D1200:120a-10: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1200:120a-11: rlung gi 'khor lo'i 'dab ma drug / me'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma gsum //
T02D1200:120a-12: sprul ba'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi /
T02D1200:120a-14: longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i 'dab ma bcu drug /
T02D1200:120a-15: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ni 'dab ma sum
T02D1200:120a-17: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las le'u gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1200:120a-19: // / stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba la don ni 'di ltar gsungs te ;
T02D1200:120a-20: phung po lnga'i bdag nyid spyi bo dang spyi gtsug yan chad /
T02D1200:120a-21: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang gi rtsa'i dra bas khyab po //
T02D1200:120a-22: de'i nang nas rab ni gsum //
T02D1200:120a-23: kha cig ni gnyis ni len te /
T02D1200:120a-24: kun dga' la dpal rigs chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal por ming dang mtshan ma gsungs so //
T02D1200:120a-25: 'di ru 'khor lo drug gi grangs mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1200:120a-27: gang zhig 'dab ma de rang rtsa'o //
T02D1200:120a-28: gzhan yang ji ltar mtshan bstan pa mtshan nyid kyang de ltar ro //
T02D1200:120a-29: lha mo rtsa 'byung med pa yis //
T02D1200:120a-30: phung po la sogs ji ltar 'byung //
T02D1200:120a-31: zhes bya ba la 'di ltar bshad de /
T02D1200:120a-32: phung po lnga'i sku bdag nyid //
T02D1200:120a-34: de yang gzhi rtsa dka' bas mi 'jig par 'gyur /
T02D1200:120a-35: mi shigs pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis 'grub /
T02D1200:120a-36: de las sangs rgyas nyid slob dpon gzhan gyi gzhung gis /
T02D1200:120a-38: slob dpon ku ku ri'i gzhung gis //
T02D1200:120a-39: phan tshun mnyam par 'brel slob dpon do mbi ba'i
T02D1200:120a-40: zhal snga'i gzhung gis phyi'i rtsa phung po la sogs
T02D1200:120a-41: pa la rten du gyur to //
T02D1200:120a-42: slob dpon aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis phyi dang nang gi bdag nyis gnyis so //
T02D1200:120a-43: slob dpon bi las badzra'i gzhung gis chu la sogs
T02D1200:120b-0: pa dang ldan pa'i brten pa'i don byed @120b do
T02D1200:120b-1: // de nas rtsa'i mtshan bstan pa rgyud las gsal ba'i phyir 'dir ma bris so //
T02D1200:120b-2: phung po med pa'i yi ge che //
T02D1200:120b-3: rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar rnyed //
T02D1200:120b-5: rtsa'i ni rten yin pas byang chub sems 'byung /
T02D1200:120b-6: de ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi 'bras bu thob pa /
T02D1200:120b-7: des ni ye shes chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1200:120b-8: de ltar min na ye shes chen po thob par mi 'gyur zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1200:120b-9: phung po lnga yi bdag nyid sku //
T02D1200:120b-10: mkha' 'gro lngar ni rab tu grags //
T02D1200:120b-11: zhes bya ba la slob dpon sh'akya mee tri'i gzhung gis 'di ltar yang bshad de /
T02D1200:120b-12: gzugs kyi phung po sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro /
T02D1200:120b-13: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad /
T02D1200:120b-14: tshor ba'i phung po rin chen mkha' 'gro //
T02D1200:120b-15: rin chen ni rin chen 'byung ldan /
T02D1200:120b-17: padma ni snang ba mtha' yas /
T02D1200:120b-18: 'du byed kyi phung po ni las kyi mkha' 'gro //
T02D1200:120b-19: las ni don yod grub pa /
T02D1200:120b-20: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni dro rje me mkha' 'gro /
T02D1200:120b-21: rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa /
T02D1200:120b-22: phung po lnga ni mkha' 'gro ji ltar 'gyur //
T02D1200:120b-23: zhes rtog nas slob dpon la 'di skad bshad de /
T02D1200:120b-24: phung po la ni rang bzhin mkha' 'gro lnga 'on
T02D1200:120b-25: kyang mi'i skabs su glo bur ba'i dri mas khyab
T02D1200:120b-26: / ji ltar zla ba dang nyi ma sprin dang mun pa dang dud pa la sogs kyis so //
T02D1200:120b-27: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor de ltar med //
T02D1200:120b-28: ces klu sgrub snying po'i zhal snga nas kyi gzhung ngo //
T02D1200:120b-29: 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i don gyis bshad de /
T02D1200:120b-30: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1200:120b-31: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02D1200:120b-32: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D1200:120b-33: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D1200:120b-34: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02D1200:120b-35: de ltar ye shes la sogs pa'i bdag nyid /

T02D1200:130b-36: srub pa dang bsgrub thabs kyi chen po'i dus su

T02D1200:130b-38: ba'i tshe / mtho ris la gnas pa'i 'chi med la /

T02D1200:130b-46: de ni dga' bral gyi don to //
T02D1200:130b-47: da ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i don 'dri /

T02D1200:131a-5: skye ba de la snang ba la sogs pa ye

T02D1200:131a-8: gcig pu'i shes rab ye shes kyi man ngag gi

T02D1200:131a-10: dga' ba re re la snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes skye'o //

T02D1200:131a-12: rnam pa sna tshogs sogs mtshan nyid //

T02D1200:131a-14: rab tu zhes bya ba ni rgyu /
T02D1200:131a-15: de'i gsal ba'i don ni 'di yin te /

T02D1200:131a-19: rnam par mtshan nyid dang bral ba ni dga' ba rnams kyi rgyu 'byung ba'o //

T02D1200:131a-23: gzhan ma kun la bkag pa'o //
T02D1200:131a-24: slob dpon ba'i ra bu'i man nag gi gzhung gis ni 'od rab kyi rgyu 'bras dang bral ba'o //
T02D1200:131a-25: da ni dga' ba rnams kyi 'byung ba'i dus bshad de /

T02D1200:131a-27: de tshe dga' ba myong bar 'gyur //

T02D1200:131a-35: dbang las reg bya nyams su myong ba'i dus su

T02D1200:131a-38: phyi yi dngos po kun la bcos ma yin //
T02D1200:131a-39: zhes gang mgu bde ni dga' ba las byung ba

T02D1200:131b-1: ngo // mdud pa las ni nas gsum tsam //
T02D1200:131b-2: zhes bya ba'i don ni 'di la ste /

T02D1200:131b-4: ba byang chub kyi sems rdo rje rin po che

T02D1200:131b-6: sgyu 'phrul gyi rab bzhin gang zhig khong du chud
T02D1200:131b-7: pa de ni mchog gi dga' ba /
T02D1200:131b-8: gsum pa'i gnas nas gsum par 'gro //
T02D1200:131b-9: zhes bya ba 'di ltar bshad de /
T02D1200:131b-10: gsum pa'i gnas zhes bya bya ni rin po che'i
T02D1200:131b-11: 'khor lo las sor gcig tsam gsum par zhes bya
T02D1200:131b-13: slob dpon sha ba ri'i gzhung gis ni /

T02D1200:131b-16: dbang bskur gyi don nyams su myong ba'i byang chub
T02D1200:131b-17: kyi sems babs pa de'i tshe /
T02D1200:131b-18: rang dang gzhan gyi bye brag gi dran pa med
T02D1200:131b-19: pas gang zhig ci yang mi tshor ba nyid de
T02D1200:131b-21: dga' ba la mi snang ba 'byung ba med ba
T02D1200:131b-22: zhes bya ba ni slob dpon santa ku ri'i gzhung
T02D1200:131b-23: ngo // gsum dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don ni 'di ltar shad de /
T02D1200:131b-24: 'bru nas sor gnyis tsam spangs te rang bzhin dga' ba la byung ba'i gnas so //
T02D1200:131b-25: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis gsum pa zhes bya ba 'og gi cha las /

T02D1200:131b-28: mo tsam de ni rang bzhin gyis dga' ba'i gnas
T02D1200:131b-29: so // de ni re zhig rten dang bcas pa'i phyogs so //
T02D1200:131b-30: brten ba'i phyogs su rang rig pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D1200:131b-31: reg bya chen po'i snang ba chen po nyams su

T02D1200:131b-34: gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings grags pa la sogs zhes bya ba la /

T02D1200:131b-36: chos ni spros pa med pa /
T02D1200:131b-37: dbyings ni spros pa yod pa /
T02D1200:131b-38: nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin /
T02D1200:131b-39: de'i phyir nam mkha' nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
T02D1200:131b-40: khams ni sa bon zhes su dran //
T02D1200:131b-41: zhes bya ba kun rdzob kyi ngo bo byang chub sems so //
T02D1200:131b-42: chos thams cad ni nang yod ces bya ba la 'gro ba'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa zhes bshad do //
T02D1200:132a-0: @132a * // gtan tshigs zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa skye ba'i rgyu'o //
T02D1200:132a-1: mchog gi gnas zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi rdo rje'i rnag bzhin //

T02D1200:132a-3: zhes bya ba sgra ji bzhin gyi gsungs te //

T02D1200:132a-5: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs su //
T02D1200:132a-6: chos kyi dbyings ni bha gar grags //
T02D1200:132a-8: srid pa mchog gi dga' ba 'byung //
T02D1200:132a-9: skye byed bha ga rin chen snod //
T02D1200:132a-10: ces bya ba la dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis reg bya'i rtsa'i bdag nyid padma'o //
T02D1200:132a-11: ba'i ra bhu ti'i man ngag gi gzhung gis rin
T02D1200:132a-12: po che zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems

T02D1200:132a-14: kyi padma'o // slob dpon do mbi pa'i gzhung gis ni rin po chen zhes bya ba ni rakta /
T02D1200:132a-15: snod ces bya ba ni ga bur /
T02D1200:132a-16: slob dpon aa wa dh'u t'i'i gzhung gis ni /
T02D1200:132a-17: bha ga'i sgras ni bcom ldan 'das /
T02D1200:132a-18: snad kyi sgras ni rang 'od shes rab ma /

T02D1200:132a-24: zhes bya ba la gsang zhig chos kyis grags pa can /

T02D1200:132a-26: gang zhig khams kyis grags pa can //
T02D1200:132a-27: sems de ni gsung gi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1200:132a-29: gang las khams kun la bye brag skyes zhes so //
T02D1200:132a-30: gang zhig gcig tu gyur pa'i grags pa can thugs de ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1200:132a-31: de yang thugs kyi 'khor lo ni khams gsum ma lus pa bskyed pa'i rgyu'o //

T02D1200:132a-37: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs zhes bya ba la sgra ji bzhin no //

T02D1200:132a-39: slob dpon sha ba ri'i gzhung gis skye ba dang bral ba /
T02D1200:132a-40: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni me
T02D1200:132a-41: long la bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i ngo bo
T02D1200:132b-0: // nam mkha'i @132b nang du thim zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'i nang du'o //
T02D1200:132b-1: nam mkha'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo /
T02D1200:132b-2: de ni re zhig don dam pa'i phyogs su ni padma'i snying po'i dbus na gnas /
T02D1200:132b-3: thig le gcig pu yi ge med //

T02D1200:132b-8: ba'o // ngo // grangs med pa skye bar mdzad pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad kyi ngo bo //

T02D1200:132b-11: // da ni bdag gis sgra bshad de /

T02D1200:132b-22: ham gi yig 'bru yid kyi rnam par shes pa /

T02D1200:132b-24: slob dpon nag po'i gzhung gis aa'i yig 'bru spro ba /

T02D1200:132b-27: 'bru sog / ham gi yig 'bru nye ba'i srog
T02D1200:132b-28: / de lta bu'i slob dpon gzhan ma'i gzung ni

T02D1200:132b-31: pa'i gzhung gis ni gnas kyi phun sum tshogs pa

T02D1200:132b-33: ri rtse ni rdo rje nyi ma 'byung ba'i gnas su rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo //

T02D1200:133a-17: su myong ba de ni mchog gi dga' mchog /

T02D1200:133a-24: rang bzhin thug pa med pa'i skabs su gang brjod du med pa de khong du chud par bya'o //

T02D1200:133a-33: gis ni srog rten bya ba /

T02D1200:133a-36: zhes bya ba la dpal dam pa shu kr'a ri'i
T02D1200:133a-37: gzhung gis ni sku'i rten byang chub kyi sems so

T02D1200:133b-11: zhes bya ba la klu sgrub snying po'i gzhung gis ni chad pa'o //

T02D1200:133b-14: pa'i rang bzhin dga' ba rtag tu shar ba zhes

T02D1200:133b-36: dpal rdo rje sems dpas 'dul ba'i gang zag rjes
T02D1200:133b-37: su chags pas bde ba chen po'i sdom pa'i dus
T02D1200:133b-38: su // rdo rje lte ba las rigs kyi 'byung
T02D1200:133b-39: ba'o / ka pa la ni dang po ka brjod
T02D1200:133b-40: ces bya ba ni 'dus nas sngon du rdo rje
T02D1200:133b-41: zhes sdom pa'i rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi man ngag gi
T02D1200:133b-42: su // gzhung ngo // ka ni dang po rtsa
T02D1200:133b-43: ba zhes bya ba la rigs thams cad kyi nang
T02D1200:133b-44: nas rdo rje'i rigs ni yab /
T02D1200:134a-0: @134a * // yang na rigs su kun la rgyur gyur pa de slob dpon bi la sa badzra'i gzhung ngo //
T02D1200:134a-1: rtsa ba lnga ru dbye zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1200:134a-2: de las grangs med pa'i rigs so //
T02D1200:134a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid phung po lnga
T02D1200:134a-4: nyid la sogs zhes bya ba la stong pa nyid
T02D1200:134a-5: kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1200:134a-6: tha mal pa de dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo /
T02D1200:134a-8: kun la 'byung ba chen po lnga la dbang mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1200:134a-9: gang zhig 'byung ba chen po lnga po de yang lha'i dngos po /
T02D1200:134a-11: dbang phyug chen po ni chu /
T02D1200:134a-12: drag po chen po ni me /
T02D1200:134a-14: rtag tu zhi ba ni nam mkha'o //
T02D1200:134a-15: de la lnga la gcig khyab pa ste /
T02D1200:134a-16: bdag ni don dam pa'i rtsa zhes bya ba la /
T02D1200:134a-18: dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
T02D1200:134a-19: kun la khyab pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar gsungs te /
T02D1200:134a-20: 'od rab tu chen po'i phyir thams cad khyab pa'o //
T02D1200:134a-21: 'byung ba chen po la kun la khyab na yang
T02D1200:134a-22: de lta mod kyi de la yang 'od rab chen
T02D1200:134a-24: de'i phyir khyad par gyis kun la khyab pa'o //
T02D1200:134a-25: slob dpon tsandra ka ri'i gzhung gis thams cad kyi sgras ni 'byung ba chen po lngas /
T02D1200:134a-26: de rnams khyab pa snang ba skye bar byed pa /
T02D1200:134a-27: 'od rab chen po zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02D1200:134a-28: shin tu spros pa dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid /
T02D1200:134a-29: skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir 'pho ba med pa /
T02D1200:134a-30: nam mkha' la gzhan gyi phyir 'ong ba med pa /
T02D1200:134a-32: dngos po med pa'i phyir skye ba med pa /
T02D1200:134a-33: gzhan ma thugs rje btub pa la sogs sgra ji bzhin gyis gsungs so //
T02D1200:134a-34: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las le'u brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1200:134a-36: // / da ni dgu pa la zab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bri bar bya /
T02D1200:134a-37: phyag rgya sgra ni bdag por byed rgyud sarba bh'u
T02D1200:134a-38: ti'i de kho na nyid bstan pa las gsungs so
T02D1200:134a-39: // dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis ni kun rdzob kyi phyogs su brtul zhugs chen po /
T02D1200:134a-40: don dam pa'i phyogs su ye shes kyi don rgyas btab pa /
T02D1200:134a-41: gsang ba'i phyogs su thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor ba /
T02D1200:134b-0: brda @134b zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i man ngag las drangs pa /
T02D1200:134b-1: yang na gsang ba'i dam tshig la 'dus /
T02D1200:134b-2: slob dpon gzhan ma'i gzhung gis ni lag pa la sogs pa'i sbyor thabs kyis phyag rgya gleng ngo //
T02D1200:134b-3: dpal badzr'a bh'u ti'i gzhung gi sa ni khams gsum ma lus pa phyag rgya bdag nyid do //
T02D1200:134b-4: gzhan ma ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas sgra ji bzhin du gsungs so //
T02D1200:134b-5: rigs kyi bye brag gis gang zhig gzhon nu ma
T02D1200:134b-6: rigs ngan rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa de ni
T02D1200:134b-7: rigs kun la rang bzhin gyi rigs med par rab
T02D1200:134b-8: tu bstan to // gang gi phyir zhe na /
T02D1200:134b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la rigs dang skye ba med do //
T02D1200:134b-10: slob dpon ba'i ra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis kun de
T02D1200:134b-11: bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs kyi
T02D1200:134b-12: bye brag dag pa sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par
T02D1200:134b-13: dag pas / gzhang sring mo la sogs kyis bstan
T02D1200:134b-14: pa de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i
T02D1200:134b-15: ye shes 'byung ba'i don du zhes lha lcam lakshm'i'i
T02D1200:134b-16: dag pas / gzhung ngo // phyi nas kyang rtsa'i
T02D1200:134b-17: don gyis gang zhig rnam par dag pa de yang
T02D1200:134b-18: mi myong ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1200:134b-19: sa la sogs pa'i don gyis gang zhig rnam par
T02D1200:134b-20: dag pa de ni kun la yod ces dgongs so
T02D1200:134b-21: // de bas sring mo la sogs kyis bye brag
T02D1200:134b-22: mi la sogs kyi bye brag mi bya zhes rnal
T02D1200:134b-23: 'byor ma badzra bi ti'i zhung ngo //
T02D1200:134b-24: ro drug ni don gyi gang zhig sring mo la
T02D1200:134b-25: sogs pa bstan pa de ni slob dpon ba'i ra
T02D1200:134b-26: bh'u ti'i gzhung gis khams gsum gso ba'i phyir nye
T02D1200:134b-27: bar myong bar bya zhes gsungs so //
T02D1200:134b-28: de kun 'bad pas mchod par bya //
T02D1200:134b-29: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1200:134b-31: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas dga' bar byas zhes dgongs so //
T02D1200:134b-33: myur du dngos grub ster zhes dgongs pa'i don to //
T02D1200:134b-34: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las le'u dgu pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1200:134b-36: // / da ni le'u bcu ba'i zab mo'i tshigs su bcad pa bri /
T02D1200:134b-37: rdo rje dang sa la sogs pa'i mchod rten la /
T02D1200:134b-38: de kho na nyid shes pa can gyis phyag rgya
T02D1200:134b-39: la sogs pa dgag ces rgyud kyi go rims kyis
T02D1200:134b-40: lta lcam lakshm'i'i gzhung gis slob dpon gyi zhal snga
T02D1200:134b-41: nas gsungs so // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1200:135a-1: pa rnams kyi sems kyis ngo bo ni shes /
T02D1200:135a-2: de'i phyir sa la sogs pa lha'i sku spangs te /
T02D1200:135a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi lus po
T02D1200:135a-4: 'byung ba'i bdud rtsi rdzas kyis nyid thugs kyi rdo
T02D1200:135a-5: rje la bzhugs pa'i gnas sku'i rgyal po mchod par
T02D1200:135a-7: gzhan ma ni spyi bo dan bshad /
T02D1200:135a-8: rigs lnga'i mnyam par sbyor ba la sog rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas sngar bstan pa /
T02D1200:135a-9: de bzhin du kun sangs rgyas yin pa'i dgongs pas rigs kyi bye brag dgag go //
T02D1200:135a-10: btung ba dang mi btung ba ni spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
T02D1200:135a-11: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid la brda'o //
T02D1200:135a-12: sogs pa'i sgras ni gces pa dang mi gces pa'o //
T02D1200:135a-13: dpal b'i ra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis shes rab dang
T02D1200:135a-14: ye shes kyi dbang mi gnas pa ni shes rab
T02D1200:135a-15: ye shes btung ba ni mchog gi dga'/
T02D1200:135a-16: mi btung ba ni chad pa'i dga' ba /
T02D1200:135a-17: de yang mi spyod ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1200:135a-18: bud med skal ldan min mi smra //
T02D1200:135a-19: zhes bya ba la 'di skad gsungs te /
T02D1200:135a-20: bud med la skur pa 'debs pas phyag rgya chen
T02D1200:135a-21: po'i dngos grub mi 'thob ces dpal dznyan bh'u ti'i
T02D1200:135a-22: gzhung ngo // gzhan ma ni sgra ji bzhin gsungs so //
T02D1200:135a-23: da ni gnas la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
T02D1200:135a-24: las gsungs pa'i rim pas rdo rje slob dpon gyi
T02D1200:135a-25: zhal snga nas kyis rim pa 'di ltar gsungs te
T02D1200:135a-26: / legs dgyes chen mo 'byung ba'i dus su gnas /
T02D1200:135a-27: gang zhig byang chub kyi sems la brten pa de ni gnas /
T02D1200:135a-28: bde ba'i bdud rtsi la gnag zhig 'phel ba dang brten pa de ni nye ba'i gnas /
T02D1200:135a-29: bde ba la yang dang yang du gang zhig skye ba de ni zhing /
T02D1200:135a-30: bde ba la rnag gi gnas su gang zhig rgyas pa de ni nye ba'i zhing /
T02D1200:135a-31: ci 'byung ba bde ba'i dngos po la bzung bas tshando ha /
T02D1200:135a-32: de ring nye ba'i byed pas nye ba'i tshando ha /
T02D1200:135a-33: bde ba'i chos la yang dag par sbyor bar byed pas 'dus pa /
T02D1200:135a-34: der nye ba'i phyir nye ba'i 'dus pa /
T02D1200:135a-35: nye ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar shel gyi dum bu la phyi'i rtsi bzhin no //
T02D1200:135a-36: bde ba chen po la thog ma dang tha mar
T02D1200:135a-37: gang zhig dngos po med pa de ni dur khrod
T02D1200:135a-38: / dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gnag zhig
T02D1200:135a-39: bde ba nyams su myong ba de ni nye ba'i
T02D1200:135b-0: / dur khrod / bde ba nyams su @135b myong
T02D1200:135b-1: ba de yang dag par khyab par 'phel ba'o /
T02D1200:135b-2: de dang dran pas nye bar 'phel ba'o //
T02D1200:135b-3: de kun bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid //
T02D1200:135b-4: bde ba nyams su myong ba las //
T02D1200:135b-5: gnas brtan pas bde ba chen po tshor ba'i gnas so //
T02D1200:135b-6: nang gi bdag nyid kyi gnas ni spyi bo dang spyi gtsug gi gnas so //
T02D1200:135b-7: phyi'i gnas ni au rgyan la sogs pa'o //
T02D1200:135b-8: slob dpon gzhan ma'i gzhung gis gnas la sogs pa don gyis aa rnams la bstan par byas so //
T02D1200:135b-9: mchod pa'i dus su mchod par bya //
T02D1200:135b-10: zhes bya ba 'di ltar gsungs te /
T02D1200:135b-11: mchod pa'i dus zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1200:135b-12: pa'i nga rgyal gyis bsgrub pa dang sgrub thabs kyi
T02D1200:135b-13: sbyor ba / mchod pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis
T02D1200:135b-14: su med pa'i ngo bos lha'i rnam pas thabs dang
T02D1200:135b-15: shes rab bdag nyid kyi sgra dga' bar bya //
T02D1200:135b-16: ri bong can 'od me tog gi / zhes bya ba la /
T02D1200:135b-17: slob dpon b'i ra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis /
T02D1200:135b-18: ri bong can gyi sgra ni zla gzal ba'i sgra ni byang chub kyi sems /
T02D1200:135b-19: 'od zer sgras ni thig le rnams kyi me tog
T02D1200:135b-20: gis zhes bya bas ni yid 'phrog can gyis so
T02D1200:135b-22: me tog nyi ma dmar ba zhes bya ba la rang las byung ba'i me tog go //
T02D1200:135b-23: slob dpon dzny'a na bh'u ti'i gzhung gis ni 'di ltar bshad de /
T02D1200:135b-24: srog ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1200:135b-25: spyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum gyi
T02D1200:135b-26: byugs pa'i nang gi bde ba chen po tshor ba'i
T02D1200:135b-27: gnas su dbang drug / longs spyod dang mi snang
T02D1200:135b-28: ba'o // lha bshos kyi sgras ni tshim par byed pa /
T02D1200:135b-29: dbul ba'i sgras ni nyams su zhes bya ba ni
T02D1200:135b-30: de ma thag tu smras pa'i bde ba chen po'i
T02D1200:135b-32: slob dpon do mbi'i gzhung gis ni 'dab ma drug
T02D1200:135b-33: cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1200:135b-34: // slob dpon b'i ra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis ni /
T02D1200:135b-35: shes rab ma'i mngal gyi padmar /
T02D1200:135b-36: srog gcod par bya zhes pa rgyal mi b'i ra
T02D1200:135b-37: ma ti'i gzhung gis shes rab ma'i padmar byang chub
T02D1200:135b-38: sems kyi me tog gis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1200:135b-39: mi dga' mi bya zhes pa la dpal n'a ga bo dhi'i gzhung gis /
T02D1200:135b-40: rang la thabs kyi mchog gi dga' ba las gzhan mi gnas reg par mi bya /
T02D1200:135b-41: shes rab ma la mi brtson pa'i sems mi bya'o zhes so //
T02D1200:136a-0: @136a * // mchod pa'i skabs su sbyin pa la sogs kyi don gal che'o //
T02D1200:136a-1: de'i srog gcod pa las yang dag pa'i rab mchog
T02D1200:136a-2: gi dga' ba'i ngo bo bsod nams kyi 'bras bu
T02D1200:136a-3: rnyed ces lung gi go rims kyis dpal padma shr'i
T02D1200:136a-5: da ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa /
T02D1200:136a-6: ji ltar rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal nas bshad
T02D1200:136a-7: pa de la 'di ru gsal bar bri bar bya
T02D1200:136a-8: / grub gsum la sogs zhes bya ba la /
T02D1200:136a-9: gru gsum zhes bya ba ni longs spyod dang /
T02D1200:136a-11: dbang la mnyams su myong ba'i gnas so //
T02D1200:136a-12: dmar zhes bya ba ni 'od rab kyi rang bzhin /
T02D1200:136a-13: ran pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu ran pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo //
T02D1200:136a-14: rim pa gnyis zhes bya ba ni rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid can /
T02D1200:136a-15: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni snying po'i rang bzhin /
T02D1200:136a-16: nang gi rim pa la dpal ldan zhes bya ba ni slob dpon sha ba ri'i gzhung gis ni /
T02D1200:136a-17: nang gi rim pa ni brten pa'i gnas /
T02D1200:136a-18: dpal gyi sgras ni bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma /
T02D1200:136a-19: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems yid ces bya ba
T02D1200:136a-20: ni don dam pa'i byang chub sems kyi thig ler
T02D1200:136a-21: grags pa can mgon po he ru ka / phyi
T02D1200:136a-23: rigs gsum can gyi rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1200:136a-24: zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo can /
T02D1200:136a-25: ro ma dang 'dzin ma dang rtog med ma'o //
T02D1200:136a-26: slob dpon mtsho skyes rdo rje'i gzhung gis lus dang
T02D1200:136a-27: ngag dang yid 'bab pa de ni nang gi dkyil
T02D1200:136a-29: da ni lha mo dag 'dri bar bya /
T02D1200:136a-30: lha mo'i sgras ni bdag po de sarba bh'u ti'i de kho na nyid kyis bstan pa'i gzhung ngo //
T02D1200:136a-31: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis ni yan lag nye bar gsungs so //
T02D1200:136a-32: lus po gnas zhes bya ba la lung la brten pa'i go rims kyi rtsa ba'i bstan pa'o //
T02D1200:136a-35: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir de rang bha ga bshad do //
T02D1200:136a-36: bha ga las byung byang chub sems kyi rje btsun no //
T02D1200:136a-37: 'byung ba'i sgra ni shar zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1200:136a-38: ji ltar nam mkha' la rgyal ba'i zla ba'o //
T02D1200:136a-39: dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus na bzhugs //
T02D1200:136a-40: zhes bya ba la 'di skad bshad do //
T02D1200:136b-0: lha mo'i yan lag dang ldan pa'i @136b gsang ba'i
T02D1200:136b-1: dkyil 'khor phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i dur khrod
T02D1200:136b-2: kyis brgyan pa'o // phyi'i gtum drag pa la sogs pa me'i sreg pa'i gnas /
T02D1200:136b-3: nang gi sgo dgu dang ldan pa'i sku /
T02D1200:136b-4: gsang za ni bde ba'i bdag nyid byang chub sems kyi dbugs 'byung ba'i mi snang ba'i gnas so //
T02D1200:136b-5: dpal bde ba chen po'i gzhung gis dur khrod brgyad
T02D1200:136b-6: la slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas 'di skad bshad
T02D1200:136b-7: de / gsang ba'i chu skyes kyi dbus su reg
T02D1200:136b-8: bya'i rtsa brgyad 'dab ma can padma dmar po de'i
T02D1200:136b-9: dbus su bde ba chen po'i rgyal po'i byang chub
T02D1200:136b-10: de / kyi sems / shar gyi 'dab mar kun
T02D1200:136b-11: rdzob kyi gzugs can byang chub kyi sems mi snang
T02D1200:136b-12: ba'i ngo bor gyur pas tshig pa'i mtshan nyid gtum
T02D1200:136b-13: drag / lho ru longs spyod nyid gyur pas mi
T02D1200:136b-15: nub tu longs spyod las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can tshang tshing /
T02D1200:136b-16: byang du dbang thob pas dum bur ma gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can 'bar ba /
T02D1200:136b-17: mi'i mtshams su chad pa'i dga' bar gyur pas 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid dmyal tshogs /
T02D1200:136b-18: chu'i mtshams su chad par gyur pa mi bzhad pa'i mtshan nyid can 'jigs par byed pa /
T02D1200:136b-19: rlung gi mtshams su chad pa'i gnas nas srog gi rlung dang phrad pas /
T02D1200:136b-20: phyi nas kyang dga' ba'i gnas su sleb pa'i phyir /
T02D1200:136b-21: mdung rtse bskyod pa'i mtshan nyid can ha had [?] god pa /
T02D1200:136b-22: dbang gi mtshams su cung zad gyen du 'gro bas
T02D1200:136b-23: mchog gi dga' bas 'gegs pa'i mtshan nyid g-yer kha
T02D1200:136b-24: can no // de ltar gsang ba chen po'i dur
T02D1200:136b-25: khrod brgyad kyi rtsa ba'i 'dab ma'i gnas las cung
T02D1200:136b-26: zad g-yo ba ni chad pa la sogs kyi gnas
T02D1200:136b-27: can no // bstan te / de ru rtsa'i 'dab ma la rim pa 'di yin te /
T02D1200:136b-36: rtsa'i yan lag dang nye ba'i yan lag mang po yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1200:136b-37: shing gi sgra nyid mchog gi dbang phyug gis gsungs zhes slob dpon sha ba ri'i gzhung ngo //
T02D1200:136b-38: rtsa'i shing me tog la sogs pa rgyud kyi zhes byang chub sems 'byung ba'i phyir don to //
T02D1200:137a-0: sogs pa'i rang las byung ba'i me tog / me tog gis med @137a * //
T02D1200:137a-2: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'gyur zhes bya ba la 'di ltar bshad de /
T02D1200:137a-3: byang chub kyi sems rang las byung ba'i me tog med par /
T02D1200:137a-4: shes rab ma'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02D1200:137a-6: longs spyod dang dbang gi grags pa can mchod par med ces dgongs so //
T02D1200:137a-7: slob dpon bi la badzra'i gzhung gis ni gsang ba'i me tog la sogs pa med pas /
T02D1200:137a-8: thabs dang shes rab la rdzogs pa med pa rnal 'byor ma'i gzhung gis ni phyag rgya dang /
T02D1200:137a-10: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las le'u bcu pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1200:137a-12: // / da ni le'u bcu gcig pa la zab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bri /
T02D1200:137a-13: nyon cig sbyin sreg rab tu bshad //
T02D1200:137a-14: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra ji bzhin gyis gsungs so //
T02D1200:137a-15: lte ba'i gnas su tshul gyis gnas //
T02D1200:137a-17: dpal gsang chen rdo rje'i gzhung gis ni /
T02D1200:137a-19: slob dpon do mbi pa'i gzhung gis ni /
T02D1200:137a-20: 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi'i lte ba'i gnas so /
T02D1200:137a-21: gsang ba'i padma'i ni slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas reg bya'i rtsa'i 'dab mar bshad pa'o //
T02D1200:137a-22: de'i lte ba'i gnas su tshul rig par bya'o //

T02D1200:150a-4: srog dang brngub pa'i mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1200:150a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1200:150a-6: slob dpon sha ba ri'i gzhung gis dga' ba'i gnas nas /
T02D1200:150a-7: gzhan ma'i gnas su slob ma'i yid kyi rnam par
T02D1200:150a-8: shes pa rang gi ngo bo'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D1200:150a-9: / brngub pa zhes bya ba gzhan ma'i zhes bya ba la /
T02D1200:150a-10: rang bzhin dga' ba'i gnas su gnas pa byas nas
T02D1200:150a-11: zhes bya ba ni bla ma'i man ngag las nye
T02D1200:150a-12: bar brtags te / mchog dang chad pa'i dga' ba nyid //
T02D1200:150a-13: srog dang brngub pa bza' bar bya //
T02D1200:150a-14: nyams su myong bar bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1200:150a-15: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs //
T02D1200:150a-16: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs su ni //
T02D1200:150a-17: mchog dang chad pa'i bdag nyid pa'i rnam pa dang bral ba'i bde ba 'gog ste /
T02D1200:150a-18: snang ba med par byas te /
T02D1200:150a-19: srog dang brngub pa mnyam par blta //
T02D1200:150a-20: stong pa chen po nyid ye shes kyis gzigs par bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1200:150a-21: de nang gi bdag nyid kyis rim pa gnyis kyis bshad pa'o //
T02D1200:150a-22: phyi'i don gyis padma'i kha sbyor ba'i thabs dang shes rab yang dag par spyod par bya'o //
T02D1200:150a-23: gsang ba'i don gyis snying ga'i snying po'i nam mkha' ru /
T02D1200:150a-24: dri med shel gyi yi ge bzhin du /
T02D1200:150a-25: byang chub sems kyi phreng ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo nas bzlog par byas nas /
T02D1200:150a-26: steng gi 'khor lo man chad 'dren par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1200:150a-27: gsang ba'i don gyi ni ha'i yig 'bru bton nas /
T02D1200:150a-28: bzlas pa'i rim pa bshad pa de ni dpal aa wa dh'u t'i'i gzhung ngo //
T02D1200:150a-29: 'jam pa zhes bya ba ni mchog gi dga' ba
T02D1200:150a-30: 'byung ba'i dus su shin tu phra mo reg bya'i
T02D1200:150a-32: 'don pa zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa kun spyod kyi don du'o //
T02D1200:150a-33: mgrin pa ya rkan 'gul med ces bya ba ni
T02D1200:150a-34: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gnas pa rtsa mi 'gul bas
T02D1200:150a-35: so // snying ga ru ni zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po tshor ba'i gnas nas /
T02D1200:150a-36: gzhan mar nang gi reg bya 'jam pa nyams su myong ba'i thabs kyis /
T02D1200:150a-37: gsang ba'i bzlas pa mi bya zhes slob dpon aa kra pu ti'i man ngag go //
T02D1200:150a-39: kun rdzob kyi bde ba'i bdag nyid la don dam pas 'gog pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1200:150a-40: ye shes kyi don gyis shes rab ni gtum mo'i ngo bo //
T02D1200:150b-0: thabs ni gtan med pa'i bde ba de ni slob @150b dpon dri med bshes gnyen gyi gzhung ngo //
T02D1200:150b-1: rdo rje skyil krung byas nas sems la sogs zhes
T02D1200:150b-2: bya ba ni rdo rje bzhin du mi shigs pa'i
T02D1200:150b-3: ye shes kyi thug pa med pas skye ba byang
T02D1200:150b-5: slob dpon gzhan ma'i gzhung gis ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis las byung ba /
T02D1200:150b-6: gang zhig kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin /
T02D1200:150b-7: byang chub kyi sems de ni 'gog pa'i gtan las g-yo ba med par bya'o //
T02D1200:150b-8: ye shes 'byung ba'i don gyis dpal bde ba chen po'i gzhung gis /
T02D1200:150b-9: gsang ba'i bzlas pa ni cha dang thig le dang tshul dang med ces bya ba la /
T02D1200:150b-10: snang ba la sogs dang bral ba'i bde ba'i rgyal po //
T02D1200:150b-11: bde ba chen po tshor ba'i gnas su myong bar bya'o //
T02D1200:150b-12: de ni ye shes las byung ba'i so sor bstan pa'o //
T02D1200:150b-13: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis ni thig le dang /
T02D1200:150b-15: cha dang bral ba'i snang ba gsum gang zhig ye
T02D1200:150b-16: shes de ni gzhan ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dga'
T02D1200:150b-17: ba'o // de ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi phyogs su /
T02D1200:150b-18: thig le dang tshul dang cha'i bdag nyid pa'i gang zhig longs spyod dang /
T02D1200:150b-20: dbang gi grags pa can ye shes de yang rnam
T02D1200:150b-21: pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid rang bzhin dga' ba'o
T02D1200:150b-23: gsum pa ni thig le dang /
T02D1200:150b-24: tshul dang cha'i nang na gnas pa'i gang zhig dga' ba gsum gyi bdag nyid /
T02D1200:150b-25: ye shes chen po de yang dag pa'i rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
T02D1200:150b-26: de ni gsang ba'i phyogs su'o //
T02D1200:150b-27: de ni rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu'i don gyis /
T02D1200:150b-28: bzlas pa'i rim pa'i brda bshad par bya ste /
T02D1200:150b-29: cha'i nang na sems la sogs //
T02D1200:150b-31: cha'i sgra ni shin tu yang zab pa'i phyir chad pa'i dga' ba /
T02D1200:150b-32: sems zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems nang
T02D1200:150b-33: du zhes bya ba ni de'i yan lag la slebs
T02D1200:150b-34: pa / sems tshul gyi nang du 'di ltar bshad de /
T02D1200:150b-35: thig le ni mchog gi dga' ba /
T02D1200:150b-36: stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyi dga' ba /
T02D1200:150b-37: rang bzhin dga' ba la mchog gi dga' ba'i grags pa can /
T02D1200:150b-38: ye shes rab tu 'jug par bya //
T02D1200:150b-39: rnam pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin dga' ba gcig
T02D1200:150b-40: pu nyams su myong bar bya zhes pa'i don to
T02D1200:150b-41: // dga' ba gsum dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa
T02D1200:150b-42: nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bstan pa de ni nges
T02D1200:151a-2: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'i bshad pa'o //
T02D1200:151a-3: / da ni nyi shu rtsa drug pa la zab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bri /
T02D1200:151a-4: dus ni cha zhes rab tu bstan //
T02D1200:151a-5: de dag sbyor ba'i dgongs pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D1200:151a-6: dpal bde ba chen po'i zhal snga nas kyi man ngag gi gzhung gis 'di ltar bshad de /
T02D1200:151a-7: dus zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dga' ba nyams su myong ba /
T02D1200:151a-8: cha zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po nyid /
T02D1200:151a-9: slob dpon do mbi pa'i zhal snga nas kyi man ngag gi gzhung gi //
T02D1200:151a-11: dus ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1200:151a-12: slob dpon nag po'i gzhung gis cha ni shes rba /
T02D1200:151a-15: cha dang dus zhes bya ba ni bde ba la
T02D1200:151a-16: shar pa dang nub pa dpal aindra bh'u ti'i zhal
T02D1200:151a-17: snga nas kyi man ngag gi gzhung gis ni ji
T02D1200:151a-18: ltar brgyud la rgyud pas gsungs so //
T02D1200:151a-19: de la do na ni 'di yin te /
T02D1200:151a-20: bco lnga'i bdag nyid kyi gang zhig zla ba rgyas pa de ni rten gyi cha /
T02D1200:151a-21: gang zhig dga' ba bcu drug pa'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D1200:151a-22: nyi ma de ni brten pa'i dus de dag sbyor
T02D1200:151a-23: ba ni dgongs pa gcig tu gyur pa nyid /
T02D1200:151a-24: bzhi dang bzhi ru dbye ba zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar bshad de /
T02D1200:151a-25: bcu drug pa'i bdag nyid gang zhig srog gi dbyug pa'i rten gyi sbyor ba bzhi /
T02D1200:151a-26: de yang bzhi ru dbye ba de ltar /
T02D1200:151a-27: grangs kyi rim pa bcu drug pa'i bdag nyid pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1200:151a-28: yan lag gcig gi rnam pa dang bral bar zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar bshad de /
T02D1200:151a-29: bcu drug pa'i bdag nyid gang zhig sbyor ba de
T02D1200:151a-30: ni thams cad rgyas pa'i phyir skye ba med pa'i
T02D1200:151a-31: phyir mi rtog ces lung ngo //
T02D1200:151a-32: de yang bco lnga'i bdag nyid pa la 'di nyid nyams su myong ba'i dgongs pa'o //
T02D1200:151a-33: sbyin pa rnams khong du chud pa'i don gyi phyir /
T02D1200:151a-34: phyi'i grangs kyi sbyor ba bcu drug pa la skyon dang yon tan med do //
T02D1200:151a-35: da ni bcu drug pa'i ye shes la /
T02D1200:151a-36: gnas kyi phun sum tshogs pa bri /
T02D1200:151a-37: srog ni byang chub kyi sems /
T02D1200:151a-38: dbyug pa ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas /
T02D1200:151a-42: de'i phyir rten gyis bstan pa'o //
T02D1200:151a-43: slob dpon do mbi pa'i gzhung gis ni /
T02D1200:151a-44: srog gi dbyug pa ni byang chub kyi sems /
T02D1200:151b-0: rten ni rnam par shes @151b pa'i rlung /
T02D1200:151b-1: slob dpon sha ba re'i gzhung gis ni srog gi dbyug pa ni spros med dngos po //
T02D1200:151b-2: rten ni byang chub kyi sems /
T02D1200:151b-3: slob dpon nag po pa'i gzhung gis ni srog gi dbyug pa ni srog gi rtsa'i dngos po //
T02D1200:151b-5: slob dpon aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis ni /
T02D1200:151b-6: dbyug pa ni aa'i rnam pa de rang thams cad
T02D1200:151b-7: grub par byed pa'i phyir de ru sbyor ba'i don
T02D1200:151b-9: srog gi dbyug pa dbus su zhes bya ba ni
T02D1200:151b-10: byang chub kye sems bdud rtsi mchog gi las ni
T02D1200:151b-12: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1200:151b-13: nang gi bdag nyid ni dbus kyi gnas /
T02D1200:151b-14: gsang ba ni de yi nang du phi'i 'dod pa'i gnas /
T02D1200:151b-15: 'dod pa'i gnas su phyi'i rtsa la sogs pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba /
T02D1200:151b-16: dbus kyi gnas su reg bya'i rtsa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba /
T02D1200:151b-17: gsang ba'i gnas su gsang ba'i rtsa la sogs pa'i
T02D1200:151b-18: sbyor ba zhes slob dpon aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung ngo
T02D1200:151b-19: // dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis ni gsang ba
T02D1200:151b-20: dang dbu ma'i gnas gnyis la mdud pa'i sbyor ba
T02D1200:151b-21: // med / 'on kyang dga' ba la sogs pa
T02D1200:151b-22: la yod pa de'i phyir ro ma ni mdud pa
T02D1200:151b-23: sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan /
T02D1200:151b-24: nang du min zhes nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
T02D1200:151b-25: mdud pa'i sgras ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid pa /
T02D1200:151b-26: rtsa rnams la phan tshun yan lag bsgril zhes slob dpon ao kra pu ti'i gzhung ngo //
T02D1200:151b-27: mdud pa'i nang du sbyor ba yin //
T02D1200:151b-29: lha lcam lakshm'i'i gzhung gis ni phyi dan nang gi bdag nyid kyi rtsa rnams la /
T02D1200:151b-30: mdud ma'i spyan gyis dbus su /
T02D1200:151b-31: byang chub sems dang dga' ba de dag la gnyis
T02D1200:151b-32: su med pa nyid de ni cha rnams dgos pa
T02D1200:151b-33: zhes bya ba ni rtsa rnams kyi phrad pa'o //
T02D1200:151b-34: cha'i sbyor ba nang du min //
T02D1200:151b-35: zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i gnas su phrad pa dgag pa'o //
T02D1200:151b-36: de bas spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir /
T02D1200:151b-37: spros med ma zhes nyid mchog gi dbang phyug gis gsungs so //
T02D1200:151b-38: g-yas g-yon mdud pa'i nang du ni la la n'a dang /
T02D1200:151b-39: ra sa n'a bzhugs zhes bya ba ni srog gi dbyug pa la gnag zhag dbus kyi gnas /
T02D1200:151b-40: de ru g-yas g-yon la la n'a dang ra sa n'a gnyis /
T02D1200:151b-41: bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma aa wa dh'u t'i la /
T02D1200:151b-42: gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo //
T02D1200:152a-1: rtsa ni sku bcom ldan 'das ma bdag med ma
T02D1200:152a-2: aa wa dh'u ti'i nyid sku gsung thugs dang bral
T02D1200:152a-3: ba de ni dang po'i rgyud kyi man ngag gi
T02D1200:152a-4: gzhung ngo // mdud pa gnyis dbus re re ni //
T02D1200:152a-5: sum cu rtsa gnyis bcu drug dran //
T02D1200:152a-6: zhes bya ba ni phyi rol nas sum cu rtsa gnyis /
T02D1200:152a-8: gang zhig srog gi dbyug pa de la mdud pa gnyis gnyis kyi dbus su /
T02D1200:152a-9: rtsa re re dang dga' ba re re 'dus pas
T02D1200:152a-10: mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbus su bcu
T02D1200:152a-11: drug gi rnam pa can cha'o //
T02D1200:152a-12: de bzhin dga' ba bcu drug pa de ro gcig tu gyur pas /
T02D1200:152a-13: spyor ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1200:152a-14: mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dngos po la dpal ye shes thig le'i gzhung gi grangs ni /
T02D1200:152a-15: dang po ni zur gsum gyi dngos po can /
T02D1200:152a-16: gnyis pa ni punda r'i ka'i spyan can /
T02D1200:152a-17: gsum pa ni drag pa'i spyan can /
T02D1200:152a-18: bzhi pa ni dz'a ti'i me tog bzhin /
T02D1200:152a-19: lnga pa ni tshangs pa'i mig bzhin /
T02D1200:152a-20: drug pa ni dung mig bzhin /
T02D1200:152a-21: bdun pa ni rna mig bzhin /
T02D1200:152a-22: brgyad pa ni pa mig bzhin /
T02D1200:152a-23: dgu pa ni dung gi lte ba bzhin /
T02D1200:152a-24: bcu pa ni glang po che'i lte ba bzhi /
T02D1200:152a-25: bcu gcig pa ni autpala'i lte ba bzhi /
T02D1200:152a-26: bcu gnyis pa ni padma'i lte ba bzhin /
T02D1200:152a-27: bcu gsum pa ni bung ba'i kha bzhin /
T02D1200:152a-28: bcu bzhi pa ni rma bya'i kha bzhin /
T02D1200:152a-29: bco lnga pa ni rdo rje'i kha bzhin /
T02D1200:152a-30: bcu drug pa ni rgyas pa'i til gyi me tog 'dra bar bya'o //
T02D1200:152a-31: gzhan ma ni mdud pa bcu drug de'i nang na gnas /
T02D1200:152a-32: de yang mi gsal ba'i phyir reg bya'i rtsa'i rnam
T02D1200:152a-33: pa la rten zhes slob dpon bi la sa badzra'i
T02D1200:152a-34: gzhung ngo // sor bcu gnyis pa'i skud pa'i mdud
T02D1200:152a-35: pa med pa gcig pu zhes bya ba la bde
T02D1200:152a-36: ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtha' nas /
T02D1200:152a-37: mgrin pa'i steng yan chad de tsam ni phyi dang
T02D1200:152a-38: nang gi bdag nyid kyi rtsa rnams la sbyor ba
T02D1200:152a-39: med do // gang gi phyir zhe na shin tu
T02D1200:152a-40: phra bar sbyor bar yang mi 'gyur zhes slob dpon
T02D1200:152a-41: ao kra pu ti'i gzhung po //
T02D1200:152a-42: de las gzhan ma mdud pa dang ldan zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin no //
T02D1200:152a-43: rlung gi 'khor lo yan chad ces bya ba la /
T02D1200:152a-44: gsang ba'i padma'i lte ba'i nang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1200:152a-45: mgrin pa'i lte ba nas rin chen rke yan chad du /
T02D1200:152a-46: de tsam sbyor ba bcu drug gi gnas bstan to //
T02D1200:152b-0: da ni rgyud las bstan pa'i go rims kyis sbyor ba @152b bcu drug bri /
T02D1200:152b-2: de bzhin shul ma'i cha'i rtsa las /
T02D1200:152b-3: ro gcig tu gyur pas sbyor ba dang po'o //
T02D1200:152b-4: gnyis pa ni 'das pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-6: gsum pa ni 'gro ba'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-8: bzhi pa ni dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-9: de bzhin dpal mo la lnga pa ni rgyas pa dang /
T02D1200:152b-11: drug pa ni sa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-12: de bzhin myos pa mo la /
T02D1200:152b-13: bdun pa ni 'byung ba'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-15: brgyad pa ni mchog gi dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-17: dgu pa ni 'bar ba'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-18: de bzhin zhi ba ma la /
T02D1200:152b-19: bcu pa ni thig le'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-21: bcu gcig pa ni myos pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-22: de bzhin zad pa ma la /
T02D1200:152b-23: bcu gnyis pa ni chad pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-25: bcu gsum pa ni au ti'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-27: bcu bzhi pa ni tshul gyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-29: bco lnga pa ni gnyid log dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-30: de bzhin me lce ma la /
T02D1200:152b-31: bcu drug pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba dang /
T02D1200:152b-33: rin chen mgrin par sleb btsam //
T02D1200:152b-34: rgyas pa'i zla ba zhes su dran //
T02D1200:152b-36: de rang shar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa nyid /
T02D1200:152b-37: rab tu gsal bzhes slob dpon ao kra pu ti'i man ngag go //
T02D1200:152b-38: bcu dang lnga ni skye ba'i rgyu //
T02D1200:152b-39: bcu drug pa la rtog med ces sngar bstan pas so //
T02D1200:152b-40: shar ba dang nub pa med pa'i phyir de la
T02D1200:152b-41: sbyor ba med pa zhes lung las sgra ji bzhin
T02D1200:152b-42: no // da ni rtsa'i mtshan nyid can rtsa rnams la bskyed pa'i sbyor ba bri /
T02D1200:152b-44: de bzhin nyid ma zhes bya ba la /
T02D1200:152b-45: rgyal po chen po aindra bh'u ti'i zhal snga nas kyi /
T02D1200:152b-46: nyid las skye ba'i dpal padma sh'i ka ri'i gzhung gis 'di ltar bshad de /
T02D1200:152b-47: bcu drug pa zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob dang
T02D1200:152b-48: don dam pa gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo can
T02D1200:152b-49: byang chub sems kyi dngos po //
T02D1200:152b-50: nyi ma zhes bya ba ni de dang 'dra ba ste /
T02D1200:152b-51: 'on kyang 'od che ba'i phyir ra'i dngos po //
T02D1200:152b-52: gang du gnyis ka'i sbyor bar 'gyur zhes bya ba
T02D1200:152b-53: ni gnyis ka zhes bya ba ni ta'i rnam pa
T02D1200:152b-55: gang du sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan
T02D1200:152b-56: 'das bdag med ma nyid aa wa dh'u ti'i grags
T02D1200:153a-2: rang bzhin de ni mtshan nyid ces bya ba la /
T02D1200:153a-3: bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma la /
T02D1200:153a-4: dbyer med pa'i ngo bo rang bzhin dga' ba'i rje btsun /
T02D1200:153a-5: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le'i rgyal po'o //
T02D1200:153a-6: bcu drug pa dang de bzhin nyid //
T02D1200:153a-7: cha rnams kyi ni skye ba'i rgyu //
T02D1200:153a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ba'i phyir sgra ji bzhin gyis bshad do //
T02D1200:153a-9: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1200:153a-11: // / da ni le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa la tshigs su bcad pa bri //
T02D1200:153a-12: sbas pa'i sngags la gsal ba zhes bya ba ni
T02D1200:153a-13: mi dge ba bcu byed pa'i gang zag la gsang
T02D1200:153a-15: yi ge grags pa can yang de bzhin no //
T02D1200:153a-16: dge ba byed pa'i gang zhag dang //
T02D1200:153a-17: de bzhin gsang ba'i tshig bsrung ba la /
T02D1200:153a-18: thams cad rab tu gsal bar bya /
T02D1200:153a-19: de'i phyir dad pa can dang /

T02D1200:153a-23: // / da ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa las zab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bri /
T02D1200:153a-24: nyon cig lha mo phyag rgya chen //
T02D1200:153a-25: mchog gi rnam pa bde ba'i rab //
T02D1200:153a-27: slob dpon sha ba ri'i gzhung gis no /
T02D1200:153a-28: bde ba'i rab kyi don gyis ni shin tu bde
T02D1200:153a-29: ba chen po snang ba chen po nyid nges par
T02D1200:153a-30: bstan to // rnal 'byor ma la de ka min //
T02D1200:153a-32: slob dpon b'i ra pu ti'i gzhung gis ni rnal
T02D1200:153a-33: 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni thams kyis dbang bskur
T02D1200:153a-34: rnyed pa'i shes ba ma la bde ba skye ba'i
T02D1200:153a-35: rang bzhin nang na yod pa'i phyir //
T02D1200:153a-36: chud zad phyag rgya chen po las myur du dngos grub byed pa zhes bya ba'i do to //
T02D1200:153a-37: rnal 'byor pa la cung zad dka' //
T02D1200:153a-38: zhes bya ba ni thams ni shes rab kyi dbang bskur rnyed na yang /
T02D1200:153a-39: de lta mod kyi bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas /
T02D1200:153a-40: phyi rol du gyur pas na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1200:153a-41: slob pa'i thams kyis rnyed ces bya ba la sogs
T02D1200:153a-42: pa ni gang zhig spros pa dang bral ba'i rang
T02D1200:153a-43: bzhin phyag rgya chen po'i don de ni rten dang
T02D1200:153a-44: bcas pa'i thams kyis nam yang mi rnyed ces bya
T02D1200:153a-45: ba'i don to // thams ma yin pas kyang mi rnyed do //
T02D1200:153a-46: gang gi phyir zhe na nyam su myong ba'i dus
T02D1200:153b-0: su reg bya'i bde ba khong du chud pa'i @153b
T02D1200:153b-1: thabs / gang gi tshe med pa de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pas kyang mi rnyed de /
T02D1200:153b-2: 'on kyang grub par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas gang las so //
T02D1200:153b-3: de ltar yang 'di ru bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas thams 'di gsungs te /
T02D1200:153b-4: rlung gi 'khor lo'i cha'i gnas su zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi rlung 'byung ba'i gnas su'o //
T02D1200:153b-5: rlung ma gnyid pa ma zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma 'bab pa'o //
T02D1200:153b-6: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyogs kyis ni / cha ni shin tu bskor ba bya //
T02D1200:153b-8: cha'i sgras ni bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma /
T02D1200:153b-10: de'i g-yon phyogs su khu ba 'bab ma /
T02D1200:153b-12: de dag rab tu bskul bas gang zhig bde ba
T02D1200:153b-13: skye ba de ni thams kyis bla ma'i man ngag
T02D1200:153b-14: las phyag rgya chen po rnyed ces nyid mchog gi
T02D1200:153b-16: cha yi dbus ni rtsa bar bzhugs //
T02D1200:153b-17: zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar bshad de aa wa dh'u t'i grags pa can no //
T02D1200:153b-18: padma'i grags can dbus gnas su /
T02D1200:153b-19: skra'i rtse mo brgya stong gi cha'i tshad bcom ldan
T02D1200:153b-20: 'das ma phyag rgya chen po'o// rtsa'i gnas zhes bya
T02D1200:153b-21: ba ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo las /
T02D1200:153b-22: rtsa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i
T02D1200:153b-23: 'khor lo de tsam khyab par bzhugs zhes slob dpon
T02D1200:153b-24: tshangs pa'i zhal lnga nas kyi man ngag gi gzhung
T02D1200:153b-25: ngo // de la yang sogs zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin no //
T02D1200:153b-26: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid rnam par bzhugs zhes
T02D1200:153b-27: bya ba ni phyi rol pa'i phyag dang zhabs la
T02D1200:153b-28: sogs pa dang mnyam par ldan pa'i 'khyud pa'i sbyor
T02D1200:153b-29: bas so // nang gi bdag nyid ni gzugs la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1200:153b-30: tshangs pa'i zhal snga nas kyi man ngag gi zhung
T02D1200:153b-31: gis ni phyi rol gyi reg bya mchog gi grags
T02D1200:153b-32: pa can aa wa dh'u t'i /
T02D1200:153b-33: nang gi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo can ni reg bya dga' ba /
T02D1200:153b-34: ye shes snang ba'i skad cig / thig le tshul me chu /
T02D1200:153b-35: rlung nam mkha' la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1200:153b-36: gang zhig mi shes pa la sogs zhes bya ba
T02D1200:153b-37: ni dpal aindra bh'u t'i'i zhal sna nas ni de
T02D1200:153b-38: ltar gyur pa'i phyag rgya chen po gang zhig mi
T02D1200:153b-39: shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas yin kyang
T02D1200:154a-0: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' chen rang ngo bo mi mkhyen @154a * //
T02D1200:154a-2: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le zhes bya ba
T02D1200:154a-3: ni go sla ba'i phyir sgra ji bzhin gyis gsungs
T02D1200:154a-4: so // de skad thos nas la sogs pa ni
T02D1200:154a-5: 'di skad gsungs zhes bya ba yan chad sdud pa
T02D1200:154a-6: pos bstan pa go sla ba'i phyir sgra ji bzhin
T02D1200:154a-7: so // no // rtsa ba'i rgyud du zhes bya
T02D1200:154a-8: ba ni tshangs pa'i zhal snga nas kyi man ngag
T02D1200:154a-9: so // no // gi gzhung gis / rigs chen po'i rgyud /
T02D1200:154a-10: slob dpon nag po'i gzhung gis ni 'bum lnga'i bdag gnyid kyi rgyud /
T02D1200:154a-11: de ru gzhun gyi gnas dang bdag gi gnas kyi mdor bstan pa tsam /
T02D1200:154a-12: bcom ldan 'das bdag la gsungs zhes bcom ldan mo'i zhu ba'i tshig go //
T02D1200:154a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1200:154a-14: zhan ma'i gnas ni bha gar bstan /
T02D1200:154a-15: nang gi gnas ni lte ba'o //
T02D1200:154a-16: de ru dpal lha mo yan lag rab kyi man ngag gi gzhung gi /
T02D1200:154a-17: byang chub spro ba khyab pa'i phyir //
T02D1200:154a-18: gzhan ma'i gnas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ;
T02D1200:154a-19: lte ba'i nang na bzhugs pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi gnas so //
T02D1200:154a-20: gzhan mas sgo'i phyi rol zhes bya ba ni rdo
T02D1200:154a-21: rje dang padma thams kyi rin po che dang 'khor
T02D1200:154a-22: lo'i gnas zhes rnal 'byor ma bung ba'i mngal gyi
T02D1200:154a-23: man ngag go // gzhan ma'i gnas ni sbyor ba 'am //
T02D1200:154a-24: zhes bya ba la 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud las bstan to //
T02D1200:154a-25: nang gi bdag nyid kyi gnas rnal 'byor ma zhes
T02D1200:154a-26: phyag rgya chen po'i thig le'i rgyud la sogs pa
T02D1200:154a-27: las bstan to // yang ni sbyor ba dang /
T02D1200:154a-28: nye ba'i sbyor ba bzhi sngar nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i gnas so //
T02D1200:154a-29: rdzogs pa'i don du mtho ris dang mi yul dang /
T02D1200:154a-30: sa 'og dang ri rab kyi rtse mo de ni nang gi bdag nyid dang phyi rol gyi'o //
T02D1200:154a-31: nang gi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i snying ga dang /
T02D1200:154a-33: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i snying ga dang /
T02D1200:154a-35: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i snying ga zhes bya ba ni
T02D1200:154a-36: sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod ces ki la ri'i
T02D1200:154a-37: zhal snga nas kyi man ngag gi gzhung ngo //
T02D1200:154a-38: lhag ma ni go sla ba'i phyir don ji lta ba bzhin gyis bshad do //
T02D1200:154a-39: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1200:154a-41: // /'di ni dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las
T02D1200:154b-0: zab pa'i don gsal ba rmad @154b du byung ba
